title: Open Government Licence v3 (UK)
fulltext:
Please review and add the licence below  (yes UK spelling!)

Open Government Licence v3 (UK): https://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/doc/open-government-licence/version/3/

I think it is important because it addresses the special needs of a government.

It should be compatible with: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
